headline: BOC EDWARDS ACTIVE LINEAR CONVECTION VACUUM GAUGE
description: Active Linear Convection Gauge     BOC Edwards Part number  D02392000 .
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model APGX-H NW25 ST/ST
Description Active Linear Convection Vacuum Gauge
Connection Type: KF Size: 25
Other Information

Active linear convection gauge (APGX-H)

Measuring range from 1333 to 3 x 10-4 mbar
Power: 14.5V to 30 V DC, 1.5 Watt
Accuracy: ±15% of reading ±3 x 10-4 mbar
Repeatability: ±5% of reading
Resolution: 6mV increments
Response time: Maximum overpressure: 10 bar absolute

Will work with the controller https://www.capovani.com/iinfo.cfm?ItemNo=172812
